string.text: I am {CONVERSATION_CHARACTER.LINK}, of the house of {CLAN_NAME}. Our family has served Braavos for generations.
I am {CONVERSATION_CHARACTER.LINK}, of the house of {CLAN_NAME}. Our family has stood since the founding of the great city of Braavos.

I am {CONVERSATION_CHARACTER.LINK}, of the house of {CLAN_NAME}. Though one should not be too proud of one's lineage, I am glad to say that we have always taken seriously our duty to protect the common folk of Braavos.
I am {CONVERSATION_CHARACTER.LINK}, of the house of {CLAN_NAME}, one of the most illustrious families in the annals of the Braavos.

I am {CONVERSATION_CHARACTER.LINK}, of the house of {CLAN_NAME}, one of the most illustrious families in the annals of Braavos. The barbarians we have slain, and the glory we have won, is second to none.
I am {CONVERSATION_CHARACTER.LINK}, of the {CLAN_NAME}, we hail from the Iron Islands since ancient times.
I am {CONVERSATION_CHARACTER.LINK}, of the {CLAN_NAME}, a name you will have heard many times in the sagas of the Ironborn.
I am {CONVERSATION_CHARACTER.LINK}, of the {CLAN_NAME}. We are of salt and rock, none like you on the mainland.
I am {CONVERSATION_CHARACTER.LINK}, of the {CLAN_NAME}, one of the ancient lineages of the North.
I am {CONVERSATION_CHARACTER.LINK}, of the {CLAN_NAME}. The fame of our family is second to none in the songs of the North.
I am {CONVERSATION_CHARACTER.LINK}, of the {CLAN_NAME}. No harder family in all of the North.
I am {CONVERSATION_CHARACTER.LINK}, of the {CLAN_NAME}. The blood of the First Men run through our veins, of course thats what they say in the Iron Islands and north of the Wall also.
I am {CONVERSATION_CHARACTER.LINK}, of the {CLAN_NAME}. Our family has served the Warden of the West for generations.
I am {CONVERSATION_CHARACTER.LINK}, of the {CLAN_NAME}. We hold our lands in fief to {LIEGE_TITLE}, and we honor our oaths of fealty.
I am {CONVERSATION_CHARACTER.LINK}, of the {CLAN_NAME}, one of the most illustrious families in the annals of the Westerlands.
I am {CONVERSATION_CHARACTER.LINK}, of the {CLAN_NAME}. We serve the lord of Casterly Rock. I pass by the ruins of Castamere often as a reminder of my place.
I am {CONVERSATION_CHARACTER.LINK}, of the {CLAN_NAME}, a noble house of Dorne.
I am {CONVERSATION_CHARACTER.LINK}, of the {CLAN_NAME}, the most ancient and noble of the Dornish.
I am {CONVERSATION_CHARACTER.LINK}, of the {CLAN_NAME}. We follow the great Khal for glory and plunder.
I am {CONVERSATION_CHARACTER.LINK}, of the {CLAN_NAME}. We will fight with the Khal until we reach the Nightlands.
Very well. What do you propose?
Lord Commander of the Night's Watch
Lord Commander of the Night's Watch
